name: scrambler
description: Scrambler is the original discord bot created for generating scrambles for twisty puzzles. This project uses [Scrambo](https://github.com/nickcolley/scrambo) for some scrambles, and Redi Cube scrambles are provided by xyzzy, sourced [here](https://torchlight.github.io/rediscrambler.js). All other scrambles and commands were written by the scrambler dev team.
